description.message: Makes the Internet open and your data safe. Topnotch VPN from the creators of famous ad blocker.

registration_error_min_length.message: This value is too short. It should have 8 characters or more.

registration_error_compromised_password.message: The password you entered was found in a public database of compromised passwords. See more details on haveibeenpwned.com. Please, try another password.

registration_error_front_unique_validati.message: Password and confirm password does not match

registration_error_default.message: An error happened, try again later

authentication_error_default.message: An error occurred, try again later

global_error_message.message: Error occurred, please contact us via support@adguardvpn.com

global_error_can_control.message: Other extension prevents us from setting up the tunnel. Please disable it in browser settings.

rate_description.message: Hey, we are a team from AdGuard and it is very important for us to know your opinion about our product. Please rate it.

auth_description.message: Uncompromising online privacy protection. Over 20 Million people have already chosen AdGuard.

settings_webrtc_desc.message: WebRTC is a special program in most Internet browsers that can allow a third-party website to detect your real IP address and use it to identify you

settings_context_menus_title.message: Add AdGuard VPN item to the browser’s context menu

settings_dns_desc.message: Domain Name System (DNS) is the internet's equivalent of a phone book. It maintains a directory of domain names and translates them to Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.

settings_dns_selector_default_desc.message: Automatically use default DNS servers when connected to the VPN

settings_dns_selector_adguard_desc.message: Removes ads and trackers from your device

settings_dns_selector_adguard_nonfilteri.message: Secure DNS with no activity logging (does not filter ads & trackers)

settings_dns_selector_adguard_family_des.message: AdGuard DNS + SafeSearch and adult content blocking

settings_dns_selector_google_desc.message: Free alternative DNS service by Google

settings_dns_selector_cisco_desc.message: DNS server that protects your device from malware

settings_dns_selector_quad9_desc.message: Free alternative DNS service with protection from phishing and spyware

settings_exclusion_regular_description.message: AdGuard VPN does not work on the websites from this list:

settings_exclusion_selective_description.message: AdGuard VPN works only on the websites from this list:

settings_exclusion_subdomains_text.message: You can add domains (e.g. google.com) or all subdomains (e.g. *.google.com)

global_error_description.message: Please contact us if you keep seeing this message

authentication_successful_social.message: Successfully authenticated! You can open AdGuard VPN and switch on the tunnel.

control_error_description.message: It looks like another Chrome extension is trying to control your connection. Please disable the other extension in your browser.

premium_limit_reached.message: Monthly data limit reached. Need more?

popup_feedback_title.message: We'd love to hear your feedback
